author: Lance

review: I received my Fire TV promptly and in good order.  Following are my thoughts and observations:1.  The unit is very slick and attractive, small and unobtrusive, and takes up almost no space.2.  It's very simple to install, especially with the "built in" video that explains the process.3.  I've not found a simple way to turn off the device.  Choices are to let it turn itself off (after some time delay) or to put it to "sleep" (which takes a few click to get to the setup screen, followed by selecting "Sleep").4.  Although I didn't expect it, I wish there were a way to access the internet, in general, by using the Fire TV.  There are plenty of entertainment options available from Amazon nevertheless.5.  You should be careful about choosing Apps....some are free while others have a cost (Slinger, for example, costs $20.00, I believe).  Costs are available but you need to read information page to find it.6.  Voice selection and searches work great and voice recognition seems not to be a problem.Overall, I'm extremely pleased with Fire TV and recommend it.  Gave it a 4 Star rating because 5 Star would suggest it's perfect...
